about_the_game:
You asked, we listened - popular request brings you two special outfits, a unique weapon and five police vehicles, the Law Enforcer Pack grants you ultimate access to everything the HKPD has to offer. Included are the SWAT Tactical Uniform, the Crime Scene Investigator outfit complete with a nightstick baton), plus five vehicles - the SDU Armored Truck, the HKPD Cruiser, the HKPD Motorcycle, the HKPD Van, and the HKPD SUV.

Please note that there is no Russian language support available for this content. This DLC will not be loaded if the current language for the Sleeping Dogs base game is set to Russian.
